achievement.name: Beyond the Vale
achievement.requirement: Defeat the Vale Guardian.

achievement.name: Put to Rest
achievement.requirement: Defeat Gorseval the Multifarious.

achievement.name: Fire Extinguisher
achievement.requirement: Defeat Sabetha the Saboteur.

achievement.name: The Big Sleep
achievement.requirement: Defeat the cave monster and release the magic that corrupted it.

achievement.name: Avenger of the Pact
achievement.requirement: Slay Matthias and liberate the Pact squad leader.

achievement.name: Deconstructed
achievement.requirement: Destroy Xera's Keep Construct.

achievement.name: Dismantled
achievement.requirement: Defeat Xera.

achievement.name: Breaking In
achievement.requirement: Defeat Cairn the Indomitable.

achievement.name: It's Just a Game
achievement.requirement: Defeat the Mursaat Overseer game piece and win the prison game.

achievement.name: The Warden Will See You Now
achievement.requirement: Defeat Samarog.

achievement.name: Free at Last
achievement.requirement: Defeat the demon and liberate the prisoner.

achievement.name: Souled Out
achievement.requirement: Defeat the Soulless Horror.

achievement.name: Deathsaver
achievement.requirement: Complete the Statue of Death event.

achievement.name: Icebreaker
achievement.requirement: Complete the Statue of Ice event.

achievement.name: Sore Eyes
achievement.requirement: Complete the Statue of Darkness event.

achievement.name: What's Death May Never Die
achievement.requirement: Defeat the Voice in the Void.

achievement.name: A Thunderous Fall
achievement.requirement: Defeat the Conjured Amalgamate.

achievement.name: Aquatic Assassins
achievement.requirement: Defeat the largos assassins.

achievement.name: The Fire Djinn Extinguished
achievement.requirement: Defeat Qadim.

achievement.name: Storm Chaser
achievement.requirement: Defeat Cardinal Sabir.

achievement.name: Terrain Tamed
achievement.requirement: Defeat Cardinal Adina.

achievement.name: Power Trip
achievement.requirement: Defeat Qadim the Peerless.

achievement.name: Legendary Whisper of Jormag
achievement.requirement: Defeat the Whisper of Jormag in the Strike Mission.

achievement.name: Legendary Aetherblade Hideout
achievement.requirement: Complete the Aetherblade Hideout Strike Mission with challenge mode active.

achievement.name: Legendary Xunlai Jade Junkyard
achievement.requirement: Complete the Xunlai Jade Junkyard Strike Mission with challenge mode active.

achievement.name: Kaineng Overlook
achievement.requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission.

achievement.name: Legendary Kaineng Overlook
achievement.requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission with challenge mode active.

achievement.name: Harvest Temple
achievement.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission.

achievement.name: Legendary Harvest Temple
achievement.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission with challenge mode active.
